entry.title: How a Mass Stabbing Set the U.K. Ablaze
entry.summary: It truly is troubling just how many Brits, on both sides of the political divide, are willing to burn their cities down at the drop of a hat.

entry.title: Can Republicans Beat Kamala Harris and the Media?
entry.summary: The press makes itself vulnerable when it attempts to alter the course of events rather than simply report on them.

entry.title: Itâ€™s a â€˜Vibesâ€™ Election Now, and for Trump Thatâ€™s Bad
entry.summary: Kamala Harris has one key advantage: She is not Joe Biden and she is not Donald Trump.

entry.title: Maduroâ€™s Attempted Election Theft Threatens Venezuela, America, and the World
entry.summary: If the Venezuelan strongman remains in power, his regime will become an even larger national-security threat to the U.S. Urgent measures are needed.

The joint flight lasted longer than five hours, the ministry added. entry.title: Joe Biden Should Resign the Presidency

entry.summary:
çº½çº¦æ—¶æŠ¥2024å¹´7æœˆ14æ—¥ Doug Mills/The New York Times Former President Donald J. Trump was rushed to a hospital on Saturday after a shooting just minutes into his rally in Butler, Pa., that left one rally attendee and the suspected gunman dead and two other spectators critically injured, the Secret Service said in a statement. ç¾å›½ç‰¹å‹¤å±€åœ¨ä¸€ä»½å£°æ˜ä¸­è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œå‰æ€»ç»Ÿå”çº³å¾·Â·JÂ·ç‰¹æœ—æ™®å‘¨å…­åœ¨å®¾å¤•æ³•å°¼äºšå·å·´ç‰¹å‹’å¸‚ä¸¾è¡Œé›†ä¼šå‡ åˆ†é’Ÿåå°±é­é‡æªå‡»ï¼Œä¸€åé›†ä¼šå‚ä¸è€…å’Œä¸€åæªæ‰‹å«Œç–‘äººæ­»äº¡ï¼Œå¦ä¸¤åè§‚ä¼—å—é‡ä¼¤ã€‚ Officials said the episode was being investigated as an assassination attempt.
